abstract: Mr. Corbijn, the director of "The American" and "Control" as well as videos for Nirvana's "Heart-Shaped Box" and Depeche Mode's "Personal Jesus," will oversee 12 cameras at a Coldplay performance on Oct. 26 at Madrid's Plaza de Toros de Las Ventas.
snippet: Mr. Corbijn, the director of "The American" and "Control" as well as videos for Nirvana's "Heart-Shaped Box" and Depeche Mode's "Personal Jesus," will oversee 12 cameras at a Coldplay performance on Oct. 26 at Madrid's Plaza de Toros de Las Ventas.

headline.main: Coldplay Live Concert Webcast to Be Directed by Anton Corbijn
